manifest.name: postcss-safe-parser
manifest.readme: # PostCSS Safe Parser A fault-tolerant CSS parser for [PostCSS], which will find & fix syntax errors, capable of parsing any input. It is useful for: * Parse legacy code with many hacks. For example, it can parse all examples from [Browserhacks]. * Works with demo tools with live input like [Autoprefixer demo]. [Autoprefixer demo]: http://simevidas.jsbin.com/gufoko/quiet [Browserhacks]: http://browserhacks.com/ [PostCSS]: https://github.com/postcss/postcss ## Usage ```js const safe = require('postcss-safe-parser') const badCss = 'a {' postcss(plugins).process(badCss, { parser: safe }).then(result => { result.css //= 'a {}' }) ```
